name: Morphos - the transforming anagram word game
name_original: Morphos - the transforming anagram word game
description:
*********************************
We've released a new game! "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power!" It's free to try so please help us celebrate by downloading "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power" today!!
*********************************

Hidden atop a 1920's skyscraper...
a long forgotten puzzle.

Is it an addictive vice?
Or powerful pleasure?
A curse unleashed?
Or a blessing bestowed?

You must decide!

From the husband and wife team that brought you "Chain of Thought" comes their newest word game creation: "Morphos - the transforming anagram word game!"

Can you and your friends unscramble the letters and find all the secret answers? We guarantee you'll have a blast trying!


FEATURES:

•Super easy to learn
•Fun way to exercise your brain
•Free hints if you need a little extra help
•Cool Art Deco styling
•Game Center Leaderboard to compare your score with friends

There are 50 free puzzles to get you started. Additional puzzle packs are available as in-app purchases.

We'd love to hear from you.

Best wishes,
Jay & Julia
